alert.note: Alert for South Washington Cascades (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 18 at 8:39PM PST until December 20 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST MONDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of 10 to 20 inches. Snow levels will sit at 1000 to 1500 feet tonight into Sunday, increasing to 2000 to 3000 feet Sunday afternoon. * WHERE...South Washington Cascades. * WHEN...Until noon PST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow will be decreasing Sunday morning, but occasional light snow will continue through the day. Snow will become heavy again Sunday night.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions visit https://www.tripcheck.com or https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map or by calling 5 1 1
